text: jump-crypto/firedancer v0.4.0 released: Full mainnet-ready validator with QUIC networking, Turbine optimizations, and parallel transaction execution. Changelog highlights 35% block production latency improvement and new shred repair protocol. 892 commits since v0.3.
author: ripatel-fd

text: arc53/rig v0.8.0 released with native Solana integration. New SolanaToolkit module enables AI agents to sign transactions, read account state, and interact with DeFi protocols. Includes pre-built tools for Jupiter swaps, Drift trading, and MarginFi lending. Supports GPT-4, Claude, and Llama models.
author: arc53

text: solana-labs/solana-program-library: Token-2022 confidential transfer extension audit completed. New PR merges group authority extension allowing batch token operations. Transfer hook interface updated to v2 with gas-optimized CPI calls. 14 new token extension examples added.
author: joncinque

text: Eclipse-labs/eclipse v2.3.0 released. SVM execution layer now supports parallel transaction processing with 4 threads. New Celestia DA adapter reduces blob posting costs by 28%. Added EVM-to-SVM bridge SDK for seamless Ethereum dApp migration.
author: naborso

text: metaplex-foundation/bubblegum v2.1 released with batch minting API. New concurrent Merkle tree implementation supports 1M leaf trees with O(log n) proof verification. Added TypeScript SDK with React hooks for cNFT rendering. Backward compatible with existing trees.
author: blockiosaurus

text: jup-ag/jupiter-core: New limit order engine merged with on-chain keeper network. PR introduces gas-optimized order matching using Solana's address lookup tables. Benchmarks show 12ms average fill time. Keeper SDK released for community operators.
author: siongui

text: sendaifun/solana-agent-kit v2.0 released. Major refactor adds multi-agent orchestration, shared wallet management with spending limits, and natural language transaction builders. New plugins: NFT trading agent, yield farming optimizer, and governance voter. 84% test coverage.
author: thearyanag

text: helium/gateway-rs v2.8.0: New proof-of-coverage v12 algorithm deployed. Hotspot firmware supports 5G CBRS radio attestation. Added support for Coverage Planner API integration. Reduced power consumption by 15% on standard hotspot hardware.
author: madninja

text: drift-labs/protocol-v2: New cross-margin engine supports up to 32 simultaneous positions with unified collateral. PR adds real-time portfolio risk scoring and auto-deleverage mechanisms. Includes Pyth pull oracle integration for sub-second price updates.
author: crispheaney

text: firedancer-io/firedancer: New benchmarking suite merged showing 42,000 TPS single-node throughput under realistic workload conditions. Includes hardware requirement profiles (standard, high-perf, enterprise). Community testing program accepting validator applications.
author: ashrvshenoy

text: rendernetwork/render-node v4.2: Added H100 GPU support with 3.2x rendering throughput improvement. New job scheduler balances workload across node tiers. Introduces decentralized model inference endpoint for AI workloads alongside traditional rendering.
author: jrhea

text: ai16z/eliza v0.4.0: Eliza agent framework adds Solana plugin with wallet management, token swaps via Jupiter, and NFT operations. New memory system uses vector DB for long-term agent context. Community contributed 48 new character templates. Framework now supports running agents as Solana programs via Switchboard Functions.
author: shawmakesmagic

text: solana-developers/token-extensions-examples: 28 new example programs demonstrating advanced Token-2022 patterns. Includes: multi-sig mint with transfer fee, DAO-governed transfer hooks, soulbound tokens via non-transferable extension, and interest-bearing token vaults.
author: nickfrosty

text: anagrambuild/nitro-svm: New SVM rollup framework with optimistic execution. Supports custom precompiles and Solana-native account model. Fraud proof system achieves 7-day challenge period with interactive verification game. Targets app-specific rollups using Solana VM.
author: buffalu

text: mrgnlabs/marginfi-v2: New liquidation engine with Dutch auction mechanics for healthier liquidation cascades. Added isolated risk pools for long-tail assets. Real-time risk dashboard API with WebSocket streaming. All changes audited by Neodyme and OtterSec.
author: jkbpvsc

text: hivemapper/hivemapper-data-pipeline: v3.1 release adds AI-powered road feature detection. New ML models identify road signs, lane markings, and construction zones with 97.2% accuracy. Map update latency reduced from 48 hours to 6 hours for high-priority routes.
author: arielsolana

text: Light-Protocol/light-protocol v0.9: ZK compression for generalized state, not just NFTs. New SDK allows compressing any Solana account into a Merkle tree with ZK proofs for state transitions. Benchmarks show 99.8% cost reduction for storing 10K accounts vs standard rent.
author: SwenSchaeferjohann

text: valory-xyz/olas: Olas autonomous agent protocol adds Solana service deployment. Agents can now be registered, staked, and coordinated on Solana with 10x lower gas costs than Ethereum. New bonding mechanism ties agent rewards to measurable on-chain outcomes.
author: DavidMinarworking

text: Eclipse-Laboratories-Inc/ibc-solana: IBC (Inter-Blockchain Communication) implementation for SVM chains. Enables trustless message passing between Eclipse, Solana mainnet, and Cosmos chains. Relayer implementation achieves 12-second finality for cross-chain transfers.
author: segfaultdoc

text: jup-ag/jupiter-swap-api: v7 API release with native Token-2022 routing. Swap engine now automatically handles transfer fees, ensuring users get accurate quotes for Token Extension tokens. Added support for confidential swap amounts using Token-2022 confidential transfers.
author: benliewxyz

text: firedancer-io/firedancer: Security audit by Trail of Bits completed. 3 critical findings fixed (all related to consensus edge cases), 12 medium findings addressed. Audit report published. Validator set expansion program opened to all stake levels.
author: ripatel-fd

text: dialectlabs/actions: Solana Actions SDK v3 adds AI agent discovery protocol. Any dApp can register Actions that AI agents can invoke via standardized JSON schema. 240+ Actions registered including swap, stake, lend, mint, and governance vote. Enables composable agent behaviors across the Solana ecosystem.
author: nicholasgasior
